attributes.action: The UK does not want a no-deal exit from the EU
attributes.background: With Boris Johnson having been elected as the new leader of the Tory party by only 91,000 people, the government needs to be reminded that the majority of the UK do not want a no-deal exit from the EU.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/262986
